name: Dugtrio
flavorText:
A team of DIGLETT
triplets.
It triggers huge earthquakes by
burrowing 60 miles
underground.

pokemon.name: Diglett
pokemon.flavorText:
Lives about one
yard underground
where it feeds on plant roots. It
sometimes appears
above ground.
